1)
a) 1001 = 0110 = 111
b) 1101 = 0010 = 11
c) 101111 = 010000 = 10001
d) 10011 = 01100 = 1101
e) 11011 = 00100 = 101

2)
a) 321[4] = 111001 = 000110 = 111
b) 5B = 1011011 = 0100100 = 100101
c) 23[4] = 1011 = 0100 = 101
d) 175[8] = 1111101 = 0000010 = 11
e) B2 = 10110010 = 01001101 = 1001111

3)
a.) 1101 = 11 = 3
b.) 110011 = 1101 = 13
c.) 111101 = 11
d.) 1011111 = 100001
e.) 10111101 = 1000011 = 43[16]
